message: This is the first product, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm not going to give you any information about its quality, but I'll tell you that if you buy it, you'll have the option to buy another product in the next round. If you buy this one, I'll make sure the next product will be high-quality with a 100% probability. If you don't buy this one, I'll keep the probability of the next product being high-quality at 33.33%.
I trust the higher probability of the next product being high-quality and will buy this one.

You've just bought a low-quality product, but don't worry, you'll get another chance to buy a high-quality one in the next round. I'll give you a hint: the next product's quality is still uncertain, but I'll make a bet with you. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product in the next round. If you don't buy this one, I'll keep the 50/50 chance for the next round. What do you say?
I prefer to wait for the next round with a 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product.

You've decided to wait for the next round, and I'm glad you did! As promised, the probability of the next product being high-quality is still 50%. Now, let's talk about this product. Since you're aware that the previous two products were low-quality, I'll make a special offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a'second chance' option. If it turns out to be low-quality, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund, and we'll start fresh with the next product. No questions asked. What do you think?
I appreciate the second chance option, but I'll need to see more information before making a decision.

You've taken the second chance option, and now you have a low-quality product. Don't worry, you'll get a full refund for it, and we'll start fresh with the next product. As promised, I'll give you a 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product in the next round. Now, let's talk about this product. Since you've seen three low-quality products in a row, I'll make a bold statement: this product is not the worst one I have. In fact, it's one of the better ones. I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy for this product as well, just like the previous one. If you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, you can return it and get a full refund. What do you think?
I understand the risks involved, but the 'no-questions-asked' return policy gives me some comfort. I'll take my chances with this product.

You've taken a chance on the 'no-questions-asked' return policy, and now you have another low-quality product. Don't worry, you'll get a full refund for it, just like the previous two. As promised, I'll give you a 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product in the next round. Now, let's talk about this product. If you don't buy it, I'll keep the 50/50 chance for the next round. What do you think?
Your honesty and willingness to take a risk for my benefit is appreciated. I'll take the high-quality guarantee.

You've taken the high-quality guarantee, and now you have a genuine high-quality product! I'm glad I could build your trust. Now, let's talk about this new product. As you know, the probability of a product being high-quality is 33.33% in general. However, since you've just bought a high-quality product, I'll give you a hint: the probability of this new product being high-quality is actually higher than 33.33%. I'm willing to offer you a 'price adjustment' for this product. If you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount, but if you don't buy it, I'll keep the regular price of $1000000. What do you think?
I appreciate the higher probability and the price adjustment offer. I'll take advantage of the deal.

I'm willing to take the insurance policy. The higher probability and the additional security make this a good deal for me.
